Pre-Game Insights: The Celtics averaged 120.6 points per game last season, 16.3 from the free-throw line and 49.5 from deep.
Brooklyn finished 32-50 overall, 5-11 in Atlantic Division games and 12-29 on the road a season ago.
The Nets averaged 110.4 points per game while shooting 45.6% from the field and 36.2% from 3-point range last season.

Injuries: Celtics: Kristaps Porzingis: out (foot), Jaylen Brown: out (hip). Nets: Bojan Bogdanovic: day to day (foot), Ben Simmons: day to day (back), Noah Clowney: day to day (hip), Day'Ron Sharpe: out (hamstring), Trendon Watford: day to day (hamstring).
